subject: Reduction of contingency charges for the execution of National Highways works
text: HRdly 7hy TTHNf Tifearrut 394 / Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 (&sm @art 3k {TTHf Ad4) 54, / Fax : 91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) 7-5 & 6, 4ar-10, ERGT, # fcrit-110075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka; New Delhi-110075 NHAI Policy Guidelines Misc. Guidelines Policy Circular No. 18.71/2021 dated 34s August, 2021 (Decision taken File No: NHAI/CMD / Misc/2021/2 Computer No: 99627) Sub.= Reduction of contingency charges for the execution of National Highways works-reg: MoRTH vide Letter No_ A-12025/1/2020-NHIDCL(Pt. ) dated 10.08.2021 has revised contingency charges for the execution of National Highways works  A of the same is attached herewith for information and necessary action: copy This issues with the approval of Competent Authority. 3i/o| w21 (Sanjay Kumar Patel) Encl:: As stated above General Manager (Coord:) To: All officers of NHAI HQ/ROs/PIUs/CMUsSite Offices. to: 1 Hindi Officer for translation in Hindi 2.
